content.eamr: ( ing-9 "1/4 cup butter or margarine, softened" )

content.text: 0) In a mixing bowl, beat bananas, sugar, oil and eggs until well blended.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "beat"@21:25 / AC
		:until ( cond-0-0 "until well blended"@55:73 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a mixing bowl"@6:19 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-0 "bananas"@26:33 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "sugar"@35:40 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "oil"@42:45 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "eggs"@50:54 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Combine dry ingredients; fold into the banana mixture until well mixed.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Combine"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( "dry ingredients"@11:26 / FOOD
			:ref ( ing-4 )
			:ref ( ing-5 )
			:ref ( ing-6 )
			:ref ( ing-7 )
			:ref ( ing-8 )
		)
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "fold"@28:32 / AC
		:ppt ( "the banana mixture"@38:56 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-1-0 "until well mixed"@57:73 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Pour into a greased 15-in. baking pan.
4) Bake at 350 degrees F for 25-30 minutes; cool.
5) For frosting, cream butter and sugar in a mixing bowl.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "cream"@17:22 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-9 "butter"@23:29 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "sugar"@34:39 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-5-0 "a mixing bowl"@43:56 / TOOL )
		:subtask ( "For frosting"@3:15 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Add orange juice and peel and beat until smooth.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-11 "orange juice"@7:19 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-12 "peel"@-1:-1 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-6-1 "beat"@33:37 / AC
		:until ( cond-6-0 "until smooth"@38:50 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
